sentences.en: "Helen had something to eat before she left," put in Cecil anxiously.
sentences.cn: “海伦走之前吃了点儿东西，”塞西尔急忙插了一句。

sentences.en: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.cn: 他左脸上的伤疤

sentences.en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
sentences.cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

sentences.en: deals were being done left, right, and center.
sentences.cn: 与各方都有秘密勾结。

sentences.en: He has support from the Left.
sentences.cn: 他有左派的支持。

sentences.en: He left the company by mutual consent last September.
sentences.cn: 去年9月，经双方同意，他离开了公司。

sentences.en: Her old man left her a few million when he died.
sentences.cn: 她老爸去世时留给了她好几百万。

sentences.en: I left a sergeant in command and rode forward to reconnoitre.
sentences.cn: 我留下一名中士指挥，自己策马前去侦察敌情。

sentences.en: I left Texas and said good riddance to all that.
sentences.cn: 我离开了得克萨斯州，总算摆脱了那里的一切。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: It transpired that Paolo had left his driving licence at home.
sentences.cn: 后来才知道保罗把驾照忘在家里了。

sentences.en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentences.cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentences.en: She held out her left hand.
sentences.cn: 她伸出左手。

sentences.en: She threatened to publicly expose his double life if he left her.
sentences.cn: 她威胁说如果他离开她，她就将他双重人格的生活方式公之于众。

sentences.en: Take the next road on the left.
sentences.cn: 在下一个路口向左转

sentences.en: There will be a radical swing to the right or the left.
sentences.cn: 这样将出现极左或极右的情况。

sentences.en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
sentences.cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

sentences.en: They clocked off duty and left at ten to three.
sentences.cn: 他们打卡下班，于2点50分离开。

sentences.en: Turn left just after the school.
sentences.cn: 过了那所学校马上左转。

sentences.en: We had a humongous row just before she left.
sentences.cn: 就在她离开之前，我们大吵了一架。

sentences.en: You left the latch off the gate and the dog escaped.
sentences.cn: 你没把门闩插上，所以狗跑了。

phrases.phrase: left, right, and centre (亦作 left and right 或 right

trans.tran_cn: 左边的，左侧的，左派的，剩下的
trans.tran_en: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart
towards the direction or side that is on the left

trans.tran_cn: 左，左面，[军]左翼，左派，激进分子
trans.tran_en: political parties and groups that support the ideas and beliefs of socialism.They usually want large industries to be owned by the state, and to use taxes to help solve social problems.
your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart

trans.tran_cn: 离开（ leave的过去式和过去分词）
